alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Herkimer County through 200 PM EDT... At 130 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Big Moose, or 10 miles northwest of Old Forge, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Moshier Falls and Lyon Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
